qDesc: Which of the following is true about ng-app directive?
qOption: ng-app directive defines and links an AngularJS application to HTML
ng-app directive indicates the start of the application.

qDesc: Which of the following is true about AngularJS service?
qOption: Services are responsible to do specific tasks only
Inbuilt services are always prefixed with $ symbol.

qDesc: Which of the following is true about $routeProvider?
qOption: $routeProvider is the key service which set the configuration of urls.
$routeProvider maps Urls with the corresponding html page or ng-template.
$routeProvider attaches a controller with the view.
